content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and help construct the structures shown.

The image shows two distinct structures:

Structure 1 (Left side) - A tower on cylindrical base:
- Base: Two orange cylindrical blocks (wheels)
- Layer 1: One green rectangular block
- Layer 2: One red cube
- Layer 3: One blue cube

Structure 2 (Right side) - A cross-shaped pattern:
- Center: One green cube
- Cross arms: Four blue rectangular blocks forming a + shape
- Corners: Four orange triangular/wedge pieces

Let me provide the assembly instructions for both structures:

For Structure 1 (Tower):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 10 (left cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 10 (right cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 8 (green rectangular block)
    Step4: Move block with index 3 (red cube)
    Step5: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
}

For Structure 2 (Cross):
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2 (green cube center)
    Step2: Move block with index 7 (blue rectangle top)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (blue rectangle bottom)
    Step4: Move block with index 7 (blue rectangle left)
    Step5: Move block with index 7 (blue rectangle right)
    Step6: Move block with index 15 (orange wedge top-right)
    Step7: Move block with index 15 (orange wedge bottom-right)
    Step8: Move block with index 15 (orange wedge bottom-left)
    Step9: Move block with index 15 (orange wedge top-left)
}

Each structure uses blocks exactly as they appear in the dictionary without any rotation, and the assembly order follows a bottom-up and inside-out approach for stability.
